amendment.description: An amendment to provide $15 billion in funds for the purpose of inspecting by United States inspection teams in foreign ports of every shipping container before the container is loaded on a vessel bound for the United States.

action.text: Mr. Young (FL) raised a point of order against the Nadler amendment (A008). Mr. Young stated that the amendment constituted legislation in an appropriations bill by imposing new duties. The Chair sustained the point of order.
